_sText:
Awp_lost_temple

This is a medium sized map that is open in the middle.  There are two “temple” structures that face inward.  Each team spawns on opposite sides of the map, and everything is symmetrical.  

All players start with the following equipment:  Awp sniper rifle, Deagle pistol, knife, kevlar vest.

Happy Sniping!

-	44 Spawns, 22 per a team
-	Nav file for bots
-	Overview radar map
-	Cube Maps
-	3d Skybox
-	Optimized with No Draw for better FPS
-	Everything is packaged into the .bsp with Pakrat

You can find the Gun Game version here: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/112285

Blair (Bobpoblo) Burkhardt - Level Design
http://www.fpsbanana.com/members/776402

<iframe width="640" height="480" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/B638US5oKY8" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
